get.description:
GET /api/v1/profile
Return saved profile for authenticated user

put.description:
PUT /api/v1/profile
Update profile with versioning and completeness calculation

get.description:
GET /api/v1/me/completeness
Calculate and return profile completeness with breakdown

post.description:
Generate documents
- Authenticated users: Read profile from database, persist jobs and runs
- Unauthenticated users: Use profile from request body (legacy v1.2 behavior)

get.description:
Get generation status - for frontend polling compatibility

Since we process synchronously, this endpoint simulates async behavior
by checking if artifacts exist for the given run_id.

post.description:
POST /api/v1/jd/fetch
Attempt to fetch and parse job description from URL

get.description:
GET /api/v1/history
List past runs with pagination

post.description:
POST /api/v1/history/{run_id}/regenerate
Re-run generation for a past job using current profile

Profile.title: Profile
Profile.description: Legacy v1.2 profile (kept for backward compatibility)
